data.name: Lumin Demo
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST LUMIN

.


About the Game

Help Lumin navigate through the dark forest, in this atmospheric precision Platformer you will find a challenging experience that requires quick-thinking and fast reactions.

A single-player adventure - with your friend Lumin, together you can do this.
10 stages from the dark jungle to get a feel for the game.
The controls are simple and accessible, work with controllers.
Lumin keeps his speed at all times, you can time his jumps and switch Lumin's color.
Lumin can only interact with the same colored platforms.

So, can Lumin count on you?

data.short_description: Help Lumin navigate through the dark forest, in this atmospheric precision Platformer you will find a challenging experience that requires quick-thinking and fast reactions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7.5, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17 or newer, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
